question: [File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rosetta-cli/src/construction.rs] [Field: encoding_options (all commands)] [Private Key Leak] During extract_private_key calls (lines 111-113, 170-172, etc.), are private keys properly zeroized from memory after use, or can they remain in memory dumps? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rosetta-cli/src/construction.rs] [Field: profile_options (all commands)] [Profile Manipulation] Can an attacker modify the profile configuration to point private_key_options to a different profile's keys, enabling unauthorized access to other accounts? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rosetta-cli/src/construction.rs] [Function: TransactionArgs::expiry_time()] [Default Expiry Exploit] The default expiry_offset_secs is 60 seconds (line 43) - can an attacker exploit tight timing windows where transactions expire during propagation, causing failed but gas-consuming transactions? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rosetta-cli/src/construction.rs] [Function: TransactionArgs::expiry_time()] [Expiry Precision] SystemTime resolution may vary by platform - can inconsistent time precision across CLI, servers, and validators cause unexpected expiry behavior? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rosetta-cli/src/construction.rs] [Function: TransactionArgs::expiry_time()] [Leap Second Handling] How does duration_since(UNIX_EPOCH) handle leap seconds? Can this cause off-by-one errors in expiry calculations? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rosetta-cli/src/construction.rs] [Function: CreateAccountCommand::execute()] [Account Creation Race] If two CreateAccount commands are submitted concurrently for the same new_account, does one properly fail or can both succeed, causing duplicate account state? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rosetta-cli/src/construction.rs] [Function: TransferCommand::execute()] [Transfer Race] Can concurrent Transfer commands from the same sender cause race conditions where total transferred amount exceeds balance due to stale sequence numbers? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rosetta-cli/src/construction.rs] [Function: SetOperatorCommand::execute()] [Operator Race] If multiple SetOperator commands are processed in the same block, does the final state match the last transaction or can intermediate states cause inconsistencies? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rosetta-cli/src/construction.rs] [Function: CreateStakePoolCommand::execute()] [Pool Creation Race] Can rapid stake pool creation exhaust validator set capacity or cause the blockchain to accept more validators than the BFT consensus can safely handle? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rosetta-cli/src/construction.rs] [Function: CreateStakePoolCommand::execute()] [Commission Change After Creation] After creating a stake pool with commission_percentage, can the operator change it without delegator consent by submitting another transaction? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rosetta-cli/src/construction.rs] [Function: SetOperatorCommand::execute()] [Operator Reward Theft] Can a malicious new_operator immediately change commission percentages or withdraw rewards after being set, before the owner notices? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rosetta-cli/src/construction.rs] [Function: SetVoterCommand::execute()] [Vote Delegation Chain] Can voter delegation be chained (A delegates to B, B delegates to C) to bypass vote weight limits or create circular delegation loops? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rosetta-cli/src/construction.rs] [Function: CreateAccountCommand::execute()] [Special Address Characters] Does load_account_arg (line 102) properly validate address format, or can special characters or whitespace cause parsing errors that leak information? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rosetta-cli/src/construction.rs] [Function: TransferCommand::execute()] [Address Case Sensitivity] Are receiver addresses case-sensitive? Can attackers exploit case confusion to transfer to unintended recipients? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rosetta-cli/src/construction.rs] [Function: SetOperatorCommand::execute()] [Null Address Handling] What happens if old_operator or new_operator is set to AccountAddress::ZERO or other special values? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rosetta-cli/src/construction.rs] [All Commands] [Front-Running] Can an attacker observe pending transactions in mempool and submit competing transactions with higher gas prices to front-run stake pool creation, operator changes, or transfers? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rosetta-cli/src/construction.rs] [All Commands] [Sandwich Attack] In blocks with multiple transactions, can an attacker sandwich victim transactions (submit before and after) to manipulate state and extract value? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rosetta-cli/src/construction.rs] [All Commands] [Transaction Reordering] Can validators reorder transactions within a block to their advantage (e.g., process their own SetOperator before a competing one)? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rosetta-cli/src/construction.rs] [Function: CreateAccountCommand::execute()] [Error Information Leak] When account creation fails, do error messages reveal sensitive information like existing account balances or internal state? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rosetta-cli/src/construction.rs] [Function: TransferCommand::execute()] [Partial Execution] If transfer fails after debiting sender but before crediting receiver, is the transaction properly rolled back or can funds be lost? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rosetta-cli/src/construction.rs] [Function: parse_currency()] [Panic on Invalid JSON] Does serde_json::from_str on line 162 handle all malformed JSON gracefully, or can certain inputs cause panics that crash the CLI? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rosetta-cli/src/construction.rs] [Function: CreateAccountCommand::execute()] [Async Race Condition] The execute functions are async (line 107) - can concurrent executions cause race conditions in sequence number fetching or transaction submission? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rosetta-cli/src/construction.rs] [Function: TransferCommand::execute()] [Await Point Exploitation] At each .await point (lines 125, 186), can the state change underneath, causing stale data to be used in subsequent operations? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rosetta-cli/src/construction.rs] [Function: ConstructionCommand::execute()] [Async Cancellation] If the async execution is cancelled mid-way, does this leave transactions in pending state or cause sequence number desync? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rosetta-cli/src/construction.rs] [Struct: TransactionArgs] [Gas Price Front-Running] Can an attacker observe the gas_price used by legitimate transactions and slightly outbid them to get priority inclusion? (Low)
